title: Premiere: Say Lou Lou – Beloved (TieDye Remix)
content:
Having recently completed a successful show at Concrete in London indie music it-girls, Say Lou Lou, are following up with a remix of their latest track, Beloved, by disco-duo TieDye. The fellow Swedes take Beloved to new levels by transforming the airy dream-pop track into club groove gold. Proving again and again that there’s not a genre these girls couldn’t dominate. Let the dancing commence….

“Beloved” is released worldwide on November 25th on Columbia / à Deux records

Pre-Order here
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d20
